task.title: Adding space to the metadata area of a thin pool

taskbody.context: Use this procedure to increase the amount of space in the metadata area of a thin pool. .

step.cmd: Log in to the master host .
Display information about LVM logical volumes on the host.
step.stepresult: Typically, the logical volume is serviced-pool and the containing volume group is serviced.

step.cmd: Add space to the metadata storage area of the serviced thin pool.
step.stepxmp:
In the following command:
Replace Size with the amount of space to add (in megabytes) and the units identifier (M).
Replace Volume-Group with the name of the LVM volume group identified in the previous step.
Replace Logical-Volume with the name of the logical volume identified in the previous step.
lvextend -L+SizeM Volume-Group/Logical-Volume_tmeta
